text: tumase pahale bhee hamane jinako rasool banaakar bheja, ve sab bastiyon ke rahanevaale purush hee the. ham unakee or prakaashana karate rahe - phir kya ve dharatee mein chale-phire nahin ki dekhate ki unaka kaisa parinaam hua, jo unase pahale guzare hai? nishchay hee aakhirat ka ghar hee dar rakhanevaalon ke lie sarvottam hai. to kya tum samajhate nahin
